articles.author: Holly Ellyatt
articles.title: Trump threatens 'far larger' tariffs if EU and Canada unite to do 'economic harm' to the U.S. - CNBC
articles.description: U.S. President Donald Trump has threatened to impose far larger tariffs on the European Union and Canada if they work together to combat trade tariffs.
articles.content:
U.S. President Donald Trump speaks to the media in the Oval Office at the White House in Washington, D.C., U.S., March 26, 2025.
U.S. President Donald Trump threatened to impose "far larger" tariffs… [+4761 chars]

articles.author: Joe Rao
articles.title: What will happen during the partial solar eclipse of March 2025? - Space.com
articles.description: Observers across eastern North America and much of Europe will have front-row seats to the striking partial solar eclipse on March 29. Here's what to expect.
articles.content:
What a difference a year makes!
Just a year ago, countless millions across North America were anxiously awaiting the "great North American total eclipse of the sun"
